data.name: GAIM Range
data.description:
GAIM Range, the ultimate VR home gun range simulator. Bring the thrill of a customized gun range directly to your fingertips. You have complete control. Set up steel and paper targets exactly where you desire, strategically position IPSC walls, and navigate through your own home while shooting. With precise ballistics and realistic firearms controllers, GAIM Range allows you to hone your skills, and develop muscle memory like never before. 

GAIM Range is a sport shooting simulator created for shooters by sport shooters.

Shoot with a 9mm handgun, a semiautomatic shotgun or an AR15. We all know the benefits of dry fire practice. Now let's make it fun and rewarding. Improve your shooting with heat maps, barrel tracking, instant feedback and post-shot analysis. Calibrate firearms and sight to match your shooting style. 

GAIM Range offers also contains additional scenarios such as IPSC for a pre-built challenge course, Time Challenge for pushing yourself faster, and Gaim of Steel for a plethora of options to better yourself.
